remarks: The set of points in a moved partition are finite.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem42.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem42.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem42.bc $e |- ( ph -> B < C ) $.
fourierdlem42.t $e |- T = ( C - B ) $.
fourierdlem42.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ ( B [,] C ) ) $.
fourierdlem42.af $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fourierdlem42.ba $e |- ( ph -> B e. A ) $.
fourierdlem42.ca $e |- ( ph -> C e. A ) $.
fourierdlem42.d $e |- D = ( abs o. - ) $.
fourierdlem42.i $e |- I = ( ( A X. A ) \ _I ) $.
fourierdlem42.r $e |- R = ran ( D |` I ) $.
fourierdlem42.e $e |- E = sup ( R , RR , `' < ) $.
fourierdlem42.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem42.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem42.j $e |- J = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) $.
fourierdlem42.k $e |- K = ( J |`t ( X [,] Y ) ) $.
fourierdlem42.h $e |- H = { x e. ( X [,] Y ) | E. k e. ZZ ( x + ( k x. T ) ) e. A } $.
fourierdlem42.15 $e |- ( ps <-> ( ( ph /\ ( a e. RR /\ b e. RR /\ a < b ) ) /\ E. j e. ZZ E. k e. ZZ ( ( a + ( j x. T ) ) e. A /\ ( b + ( k x. T ) ) e. A ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem42 $p |- ( ph -> H e. Fin ) $.
